name: parsed_datetime
description: Date and time when scraping of this location ID was done

name: plug_types_searched
description: Semicolon-delimited list of strings indicating charger plug types included in parsing when this was scraped

name: location_id
description: Plugshare-specific unique ID for a charging station/location. STR for zero padding reasons

name: search_cell_latitude
description: LAT of hexagonal search cell used. Can be used for rough approx of location LAT.

name: search_cell_longitude
description: LONG of hexagonal search cell used. Can be used for rough approx of location LONG.
